sentences.sContent: Shortly afterward, police arrested four suspects.
sentences.sCn: 之后不久，警方逮捕了４名嫌疑犯。

remMethod.val: after(后面的) ＋ ward(方向) → 后来， 以后

words.tran: 最后的；最后部的；最靠近船尾的

trans.tranOther: If you do something or if something happens afterward, you do it or it happens after a particular event or time that has already been mentioned
